snippet: Silhouettes seem to capture the spirit of the dogs — an outward projection of how they see themselves, off the leash at the park.
abstract: Menagerie column by writer Giancarlo T Roma describes his father Thomas's project of photographing shadows of dogs who frequented dog park in Bay Ridge, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Silhouettes seem to capture the spirit of the dogs — an outward projection of how they see themselves, off the leash at the park.
